member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.GUI.GUIObject.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks:
Since the name property is read-only, the name for an object must be passed to this constructor.
Typically it will be difficult to rename an object that resides in a collection with its name as the key, thus making the property writable would be counter-productive.
However, objects that descend from this object may choose to implement their own renaming scheme if they so choose.
Ensure that the name parameter has a non-null string or is not a zero-length string. Failing to do so will raise a ArgumentNullException.
member.exception: Thrown when the name parameter is NULL or a zero length string.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Graphics.Utilities.ParticleEmitter.#ctor(System.String,GorgonLibrary.Graphics.Sprite,GorgonLibrary.Vector2D)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Sprite to use for the particle.
member.remarks:
Since the Name property is read-only, the name for an object must be passed to this constructor.
Typically it will be difficult to rename an object that resides in a collection with its name as the key, thus making the property writable would be counter-productive.
However, objects that descend from this object may choose to implement their own renaming scheme if they so choose.
Ensure that the name parameter has a non-null string or is not a zero-length string. Failing to do so will raise a ArgumentNullException.
member.exception: Thrown when the name parameter is NULL or a zero length string.
